content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]ACCU-Beam® Fixed Focal Handpieces are straightforward and cost-effective options for tissue incision, coagulation, and ablation. They are available in a variety of focal lengths. These hand pieces are compatible with most articulating arm CO₂ lasers by utilizing our laser thread adapters.

  • Available in F75, F100, F125, and F200mm
  • Compatible with most lasers by utilizing thread adapters
  • Built-in port for positive airflow
  • Sterilizable tip

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”72331″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1571939888911{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Fixed Focal Handpieces

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Our ACCU-Beam® Fixed Focal Handpieces are simple, effective, and competitively priced options to use an articulating arm laser for tissue incision, coagulation, and ablation. Each handpiece features appropriate optics, a positive airflow port, and a sterilizable tip.

Like our other laser accessories the Fixed Focal Handpieces can be used with almost any laser’s articulating arm by taking advantage of our laser thread adapters. If you purchase a new laser in the future this thread adapter can be changed to work with it.

Part # 6103 – F75mm
Part # 6104 – F100mm
Part # 6105 – F125mm
Part # 6108 – F200mm[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d54f27e-8215″][vc_column_text]Compatible with Sharplan, NIIC, LaserSonics, Merrimack, Illumina, Coherent, Intermedic, Lumenis, Zeiss, SWOT, Ellman/Sandstone, Union, Lasering, DEKA, Syneron, Bison, JH Laser and many other lasers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3df27e-8215″][vc_column_text]Fixed Focal Handpieces are class 2 devices, and are approved to bear the CE mark. TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014af27e-8215″][vc_column_text] All of our products include a 1 year manufacturer’s warranty and support for the usable lifetime of the product. [/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
